title: LeBron scores 8; record double-digit streak ends
content: LeBron James had a chance to extend his record double-digit scoring streak but opted to pass the ball, setting up Rui Hachimura's winning 3-pointer at the buzzer against the Raptors.

title: St. Brown toughs out injury, fuels Lions in key win

content: Due to mass cancellation of Indigo flights, the couple ‚Äî who were to fly from Bhubaneswar to Hubballi ‚Äî could not make it to the venue before the scheduled time and day, and joined their own reception via a video call.

content: Hmar People's Convention (Democratic) had earlier demanded an autonomous district council under the sixth schedule of the constitution by carving out Hmar-dominated villages in the northeastern part of Mizoram, adjoining Manipur.

title: Row over construction at Shakthikulangara harbour
content: Fishers‚Äô association has drawn fierce opposition against a museum and hall construction project at the harbour

content: A total number of 4,80,583 road accidents have been reported by Police Departments of States and Union Territories (UTs) in the country during the calendar year 2023, claiming 1,72,890 lives and causing injuries to 4,62,825 persons.

title: Watch: IndiGo flight cancellations stretch into fourth straight day
content: Chaos persisted nationwide as IndiGo‚Äôs flight cancellations entered a fourth day. Delhi halted all departures till midnight, while Bengaluru saw over 100 cancellations. The airline blamed planning gaps in implementing new pilot rest norms. With more than 500 flights hit, disruptions spilled over to other carriers, prompting government intervention.

title: High Court rejects mosque's plea to use loudspeaker, says no religion mandates prayers with voice amplifiers
content: The Bench noted that the petitioner was unable to submit any material to show that the use of loudspeakers was mandatory/necessary to practice their religion

title: IndiGo flight cancellations LIVE: Airline cancels over 1,000 flights to achieve reboot, says CEO Pieter Elbers
content: Aviation Ministry has constituted a 4-member committee to identify causes leading to flight disruptions at IndiGo on Friday.

content: The CJI said although AI may assist with judicial tasks, it cannot replace or influence judicial reasoning

content: IndiGo CEO Pieter Elbers issued a public apology this evening after more than a thousand flights were cancelled today, the most severely impacted day in terms of cancellations.

content: India is witnessing a sharp rise in household borrowing, signalling a growing dependence on loans to meet aspirations and expenses.

content: Tensions were high in Madhya Pradesh's Shamgarh city on Friday after a horrifying case of blackmail and the circulation of an obscene video of a 16-year-old girl came to light.

title: 'No Group Or Individual Can Issue Decrees': Manipur Government's Warning
content: The government in Manipur - a state that will complete one year of the President's rule in two months - has clarified that no individual or group can issue decrees, impose punishments or restrict lawful cultural, economic and artistic activities.

title: Misuse To Land Grab, Madhya Pradesh 'IT Parks' Have Everything But IT Firms
content: A new report by the Comptroller and Auditor General of India (CAG) has revealed that plots reserved exclusively for Information Technology (IT) companies are being widely misused across major IT parks in Bhopal, Indore, Jabalpur, and Gwalior.

title: Centre Orders High-Level Probe Into IndiGo Crisis, Expects Fix In 3 Days
content: In what will be music to the ears of passengers hit hard by the IndiGo disruptions, the Centre has said flight schedules are expected to stabilise by Saturday and a return to normalcy is likely to be achieved within three days, which would be Monday.

title: Navi Mumbai Airport To Get Railway Station, "Special Gift," Says Fadnavis
content: Ahead of operations beginning at the Navi Mumbai International Airport on December 25, the airport will also get a railway station nearby, as the Targhar station on the Uran-Belapur line is also operationalised.

title: India Will Soon Launch Free 30-Day Visas For Russian Citizens: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said that people-to-people connections have always held a special place in bilateral relations and New Delhi will soon launch a free 30-day e-tourist visa and a 30-day group tourist visa for Russian citizens.

title: Cannot Deport Bangla-Speaking People To Bangladesh: Trinamool MP
content: TMC's Shatabdi Roy said Bangla-speaking people are being deported to Bangladesh and asserted that language cannot be a consideration for authorities for taking such steps.

title: 'Not Promoting Cigarettes': Top Court's No To Ban On Arundhati Roy's Memoir
content: The Supreme Court on Friday dismissed a plea seeking ban of acclaimed author Arundhati Roy's book, 'Mother Mary Comes to Me', alleging that the cover picture depicts the author smoking cigarette/beedi in violation of a central legislation.

content: Netflix has agreed to acquire film and television studio Warner Bros. Discovery for nearly $83 billion, the two US companies announced Friday.

content: IndiGo on Friday cancelled till midnight all its domestic flights departing from the Delhi airport as the airline continues to grapple with significant operational disruptions.

content: In good news for Tirupati temple pilgrims, a substantial 90 per cent of the available Vaikuntha Dwara Darshan time, 164 hours out of a total 182 hours, has been earmarked for common devotees through the electronic lucky dip (e-dip) system.

title: Opinion: Opinion | A Complex Problem For BJP: Constitution vs Constitution
content: The BJP's own constitution, rooted in its basic philosophy - Integral Humanism - conflicts with the country's Constitution. And it is not about the differences over the Preamble.

content: IndiGo has cancelled hundreds of flights across India this week after failing to make sufficient changes to its roster planning to accommodate new government norms.

content: The Ministry of Civil Aviation on Friday said that it is maintaining round-the-clock monitoring in response to the unprecedented disruption caused by the large-scale cancellation and delay of IndiGo flights across the country.

content: Russian President Vladimir Putin's official visit to India has had a huge impact not only on defence, but on trade ties as well between the two longtime friends.

title: Govt puts new crew duty rule in abeyance; expects IndiGo normalcy by Monday
content: The government has suspended new flight duty time limitation rules for pilots, aiming to normalize IndiGo's flight schedules by Monday. This decision, made in the interest of passengers, follows IndiGo's cancellation of over 750 flights. A high-level inquiry will investigate the disruptions and determine accountability.

title: Heavy fine! Pakistan's Zaman faces ICC punishment: What did he do wrong?
content: Pakistan's Fakhar Zaman has been fined 10 per cent of his match fee and received one demerit point for a Level 1 ICC Code of Conduct breach. The violation occurred during the Tri-Series final against Sri Lanka when Zaman showed dissent towards an umpire's dismissal decision. He admitted the offence and accepted the proposed sanction.

title: 'Will undress on your counter‚Äô: Flyer threatens to remove clothes amid IndiGo cancellations - watch
content: A passenger threatened to undress at Delhi airport amid IndiGo's widespread operational disruptions. The airline cancelled all domestic departures from Delhi until midnight on December 5th, 2025, stranding thousands. This incident underscores growing traveler frustration with IndiGo's ongoing crew shortages and operational challenges.

title: ‚ÄòMetaverse‚Äô budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
content: Meta is reportedly slashing its Metaverse budget by up to 30% for 2026, signaling a potential shift away from its ambitious virtual reality vision after incurring over $70 billion in losses. This move comes as the company doubles down on artificial intelligence, investing heavily in AI infrastructure and talent acquisition.

title: Gautam Gambhir under fire! 'Stop confusing him': Ex-India star blasts team management
content: Ravichandran Ashwin urged head coach Gautam Gambhir to provide Washington Sundar with clear role clarity as a primary bowler who can bat. Ashwin highlighted India's finishing struggles and questioned if a fast-bowling all-rounder like Nitish Kumar Reddy might be a better option given the team's bowling limitations.

title: IND vs SA: Records Virat Kohli can shatter; India gear up for 3rd ODI in Vizag
content: India and South Africa are tied 1-1 heading into their final ODI, a series marked by high-scoring games and broken batting records. Virat Kohli is on the verge of multiple century milestones, while both teams could set new records for successful 350+ chases. The decisive match promises further batting fireworks.

title: ChatGPT vs Gemini: AI godfather predicts winner; says Google has ‚Äòbig advantage‚Äô
content: AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton believes Google is now surpassing OpenAI in the AI race, a development he finds surprisingly late.  Hinton points to Google's Gemini 3, its AI chip advantage, and vast data as key strengths.  He notes Google's past caution stemmed from earlier AI missteps, but now predicts their dominance.

title: Warner Bros acquisition: Netflix wins bidding war with$82.7 billion; executive deal talk next
content: Netflix has announced a monumental $82.7 billion acquisition of Warner Bros., including HBO and HBO Max. This strategic move integrates Warner Bros.' extensive film and television library with Netflix's global streaming platform, promising to significantly enhance content offerings and accelerate business growth for decades to come.

title: IPL: New RR captain? Riyan Parag breaks silence after Samson‚Äôs shocking CSK trade
content: With Sanju Samson's departure to CSK, Rajasthan Royals are considering Riyan Parag as their next captain. Parag, who captained RR in Samson's absence last season, expressed his readiness for the role but emphasized the management's decision will be made post-auction. He also acknowledged the significant workload leadership entails.

title: Salesforce name change: CEO confirms possibility of ‚ÄòAgentforce‚Äô; says won‚Äôt be shocked
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff is considering renaming the company 'Agentforce' to highlight its AI focus. Products like 'Sales' are already being rebranded as 'Agentforce Sales'. This strategic shift away from 'cloud' terminology is driven by customer demand for AI agents, as revealed in recent focus groups.

title: Savings in several lakhs! How much money has RBI put in your pocket in 2025? Check calculations
content: RBI repo rate cut EMI calculations: While the 25 basis points rate cut will give marginal relief to new and existing loan borrowers, it is the cumulative 1.25% rate cut since the start of this year, that will yield substantial savings over the entire loan tenure.

title: Aspiration pneumonia: Doctor explains how a simple accident can turn life-threatening
content: A simple sip of water can turn life-threatening, leading to aspiration pneumonia when liquid enters the lungs instead of the stomach. This condition, often caused by bacteria in aspirated material, inflames lung tissue and impairs breathing.  Elderly individuals and those with swallowing difficulties are particularly at risk. Early recognition and prevention are key.

title: Kobe Bryant slammed by alleged friend, claims he 'wasn‚Äôt a good person'
content: New claims suggest NBA legend Kobe Bryant was not a good person and neglected family and friends. An alleged childhood friend shared disappointment over unmet promises of support. This contrasts with Kobe's documented generosity and mentorship. The allegations have sparked debate online, highlighting the complex nature of his legacy. Kobe's life included both personal challenges and significant positive contributions.

title: Travis Kelce‚Äôs bold Europe comments on Taylor Swift spark future rumors
content: Travis Kelce recently spoke about his trip to Lake Como with Taylor Swift. He described the beautiful scenery and the warmth of the local people. Kelce expressed his joy and wonder at the experience, finding a new appreciation for life's pace. George Clooney also joined the conversation, sharing his own fondness for the Italian region.

title: Los Angeles Lakers vs Toronto Raptors regular season game - Full injury report
content: The Lakers and Raptors face significant injury woes as they clash on December 4, 2025. With Luka Doncic and Marcus Smart out for LA, and Jakob Poeltl and RJ Barrett sidelined for Toronto, depth players will be crucial. This game becomes a test of adaptability and which supporting cast can step up.

title: CeeDee Lamb ruled out vs. Lions after concussion in major Cowboys setbac
content: Dallas Cowboys wide receiver CeeDee Lamb was ruled out of Thursday's game against the Detroit Lions after suffering a concussion on a hard fall while attempting a diving catch.  He exhibited a fencing response, a common sign of head trauma, and will now enter concussion protocol, making his status for the next game uncertain.

title: INDvsSA: 'He can‚Äôt fit in India‚Äôs plans'- Ashwin reveals why selectors are ignoring Parag
content: Ravichandran Ashwin believes Riyan Parag isn't ready for India's ODI middle order despite growing calls for his inclusion. Ashwin noted Parag's lack of experience batting at No. 5 or 6, stating the youngster needs to demonstrate adaptability at the domestic level to push for those crucial slots.

title: 'Agreed on economic cooperation plan till 2030': PM Modi in joint statement with Putin - top quotes
content: Prime Minister Modi hailed India-Russia ties as a "North star" in a changing world, announcing an economic cooperation program until 2030. Both nations reaffirmed their commitment to energy security and combating terrorism. Discussions also covered trade, with Russia pledging continued fuel shipments to India's growing economy.

title: Home loan interest rates set to fall to historic low of 7.1% after RBI move
content: Home loan rates are poised to fall to Covid-era lows following a 25 basis point repo rate cut by the RBI. This move is expected to lower EMIs for borrowers, though banks may need to adjust deposit rates. Non-banking finance companies anticipate immediate benefits from reduced funding costs, aiding last-mile financiers and small businesses.

title: Magic Johnson pushes for All-Star nod as Lakers‚Äô unsung hero shines vs Raptors
content: Austin Reaves delivered a season-shifting performance, scoring 44 points and dishing out 11 assists to lead a short-handed Lakers to a 123-120 victory over the Raptors.  Magic Johnson publicly backed Reaves for an All-Star spot, highlighting his dominant play and leadership in a crucial win that strengthens the Lakers' Western Conference push.

title: IND vs SA: 'Where was the intent?' - Ex-cricketer slams Jadeja, blames knock for Raipur defeat
content: Former India all-rounder Irfan Pathan criticised Ravindra Jadeja's slow batting in the second ODI loss to South Africa. Pathan believes Jadeja's lack of urgency, scoring 24 off 27 balls, cost India crucial runs. Despite centuries from Kohli and Gaikwad, the team failed to capitalise fully, allowing South Africa to chase a formidable target.

title: Frustrated, lying on floors, confused: Videos capture chaos as IndiGo cancels 500+ flights; watch
content: India's aviation sector faced a severe meltdown as IndiGo cancelled over 400 flights, leaving thousands stranded and airports in chaos. Passengers endured long waits and exorbitant fares on other airlines due to the crisis, triggered by cabin crew shortages. IndiGo expects full operational recovery only by February 2026, highlighting a significant disruption.

title: Harvard-trained doctor shares 5 glycolic acid secrets you probably didn‚Äôt know
content: Glycolic acid, a dermatologist-trusted ingredient, offers versatile skincare benefits beyond facial treatments. It effectively combats back acne by dissolving pore buildup, softens rough elbows and knees, and smooths persistent bumps from keratosis pilaris. Additionally, it prevents ingrown hairs and tackles foot odor and calluses by shedding dead skin.

title: Comet 3I/ATLAS reveals glowing coma plasma and dust tails in Juice NavCam images
content: ESA's Juice spacecraft has captured striking new images of Comet 3I/ATLAS, revealing its active coma and distinct plasma and dust tails. While originally designed for Jupiter, Juice's navigation camera provided an early glimpse of the comet's activity. Full scientific data, gathered by five specialized instruments, is expected in February 2026, promising deeper insights into this interstellar visitor.

title: IND vs SA: ‚ÄòNever shirked responsibility‚Äô; RCB head coach defends under-fire Gambhir
content: Andy Flower, in Dubai for ILT20 commentary and RCB scouting, praised Virat Kohli‚Äôs hunger and ‚Äúincredible standard‚Äù after his back-to-back ODI tons. The RCB coach backed India head coach Gautam Gambhir amid criticism following consecutive home Test series defeats, saying responsibility cannot fall on one man. Flower also urged India to avoid extreme turners, insisting their talent is strong enough to win on sporting pitches.

title: 'Murdered all kids on Ekadashi': Occult omen or mental illness? Disturbing pattern of Haryana's 'killer mom'
content: A mother in Hisar/Panipat is accused of drowning four children, including her own son. While her family and victims' kin suspect occult practices, police point to psychopathic tendencies and a lack of remorse. The accused reportedly confessed to killing children perceived as more beautiful than her own. Authorities are investigating further, dismissing supernatural claims.

title: Starc breaks Pak legend's big record: 'Super Starc!' ‚Äî Wasim Akram posts classy message
content: Mitchell Starc has become the most successful left-arm fast bowler in Test history, surpassing Wasim Akram's 414 wickets with a stellar 6/75 performance. Akram lauded Starc as a worthy successor, but the Australian humbly stated Akram remains the benchmark. Starc now ranks among Australia's top wicket-takers, with his pursuit of further milestones ongoing.

title: IndiGo crisis: Bengaluru couple attends own wedding reception virtually
content: A newlywed couple, stranded in Bhubaneswar due to IndiGo flight cancellations, virtually attended their own wedding reception in Hubballi.  Their parents represented them at the venue, with the couple appearing on a large screen via video call.  This incident highlights the widespread travel chaos caused by airline operational issues, prompting calls for government intervention.

title: Gabrielle Union on infertility as Dwyane Wade had child during split
content: Gabrielle Union revealed the profound devastation she experienced when Dwyane Wade fathered a child with another woman during a 2013 split, especially as she struggled with infertility.  She felt her soul was shattered, believing she had to let Wade go if she didn't pursue surrogacy to give him the family he desired.

title: 5 tiger reserves that offer the strongest chances of seeing a tiger up close
content: India's tiger population is thriving, with five reserves consistently offering the best chances for sightings. Jim Corbett, Kaziranga, Bandhavgarh, Ranthambore, and Periyar stand out due to high densities, abundant prey, and effective conservation. These areas are crucial for ecological studies and provide unparalleled opportunities to witness these magnificent big cats in their natural habitat.

title: Satya Nadella says IQ still matters: Here's what professionals must learn
content: As AI reshapes the workplace, Satya Nadella warns that technical skill alone can‚Äôt guarantee success. He argues that emotional intelligence‚Äîempathy, collaboration, and human connection‚Äîis becoming the decisive career asset. With automation handling analytical tasks, Nadella urges professionals to build adaptability, communication, and interpersonal strength to stay relevant in an increasingly machine-driven economy.

title: Watch: Chaos at Barabati! Fans sprint and break queues for IND‚ÄìSA T20I tickets
content: Thousands of passionate Indian cricket fans descended upon Cuttack's Barabati Stadium for tickets to the India vs. South Africa T20I, resulting in chaotic scenes. A viral video captured a frenzied crowd pushing and surging towards ticket counters, raising concerns about public safety amidst intense demand for the upcoming series.

title: ‚ÄòOpportunity for us‚Äô: RBI governor sees impact of Trump tariffs as ‚Äòminimal‚Äô
content: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra views US tariffs on Indian economy as a minimal impact, calling it an opportunity for diversification and productivity improvements. Despite a significant 28.5% drop in exports to the US from May to October 2025, the central bank believes the domestic demand-driven economy will emerge stronger.

title: High cholesterol symptoms in legs at night: Warning signs you should never ignore
content: Leg pain, numbness, coldness, swelling, and skin changes, especially at night, can signal high LDL cholesterol. These symptoms indicate reduced blood flow due to arterial plaque buildup, potentially leading to serious heart issues. Early detection through regular monitoring and lifestyle changes is crucial for managing 'bad cholesterol' and protecting your health.

title: ‚ÄòDoomsday plane‚Äô: What is the ‚ÄòFlying Kremlin‚Äô? Putin‚Äôs jet was the most-tracked flight
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin's specially modified Ilyushin Il-80, dubbed the ‚ÄúFlying Kremlin,‚Äù became the world's most tracked flight en route to Delhi. This secure airborne command center, designed for extreme conditions and equipped with advanced communication and defensive systems, underscores Russia's strategic leadership protection.

title: Bomb scare on Dubai‚ÄìHyderabad Emirates flight: Threat email sparks alert; aircraft lands safely at RGIA
content: Hyderabad Airport faced a bomb threat for an Emirates flight from Dubai on Friday, prompting standard safety protocols upon landing. Passengers were safely deplaned after the aircraft was moved to an isolated bay. This incident follows a string of similar threats targeting flights to the city, raising security concerns.

title: Top neurologist reveals the hidden reasons behind a stroke
content: Strokes strike young adults under 45 more often than before, often from sneaky causes missed in routine checkups. While older adults face plaque buildup, youth deal with heart holes, vessel tears, blood clotting glitches, lipid quirks, and silent sugar issues

title: Bigg Boss 19 reveals the first look of its trophy as the top 5 finalists are announced
content: Bigg Boss 19's grand finale is just two days away, with Gaurav Khanna, Tanya Mittal, Amaal Mallik, Pranit More, and Farrhana Bhatt now the Top 5 finalists. The show unveiled its 'Gharwalon ki Sarkaar' themed trophy, incorporating Salman Khan's signature gesture. Malti Chahar's exit followed a heated exchange, leaving the finalists to pick their preferred winner, sparking further arguments.

title: LeBron ends 1,297-game double-digit streak but delivers winning assist vs Raptors
content: LeBron James' record 1,297-game scoring streak ended Thursday night. He chose to pass for a game-winning shot instead of scoring himself. The Los Angeles Lakers secured a 123-120 victory over the Toronto Raptors. James' focus remains on team success. This unselfish play highlights his commitment to winning above personal milestones.

title: All the news, flips and top moments from the early signing day
content: DT Lamar Brown, the no. 1 overall ESPN 300 recruit, explains his decision to not sign yet after verbally committing to LSU earlier this year . college football's early signing period started Wednesday and runs until Friday . if a prospect doesn't sign a national letter of intent by Friday, the next national signing day for this cycle .

title: IndiGo crisis: 'Plane ready but no pilot' - first-person account of a harried flyer
content: IndiGo crisis: inside pilot shortage, rule change and winter delays behind over 200 Cancellations Thursday began well . a colleague advised me that tomorrow could be chaotic too. try to change your carrier's schedule . the flight was scheduled to depart at 2.15pm on Thursday, but a ticket was pricier than a seat at a Taylor Swift concert .

title: ACC/SEC Challenge guide: The best games, from Duke, Arkansas, more
content: the 2025 ACC/SEC Men's Challenge featured a bevy of AP top 25 men's college basketball teams . on Tuesday, the ACC came out swinging, with no. 4 Duke escaping an attempted double-digit comeback by no. 15 Florida by a single point . a one-possession victory for no. 16 North Carolina over no. 18 Kentucky ended the night up 6-2 on the SEC .

title: Want a Kalen DeBoer 'Black Hoodie of Death'? Good luck
content: "Excuse me," a woman says as she sifted through the endless round racks of Alabama Crimson Tide apparel . "i was hoping to buy him one of those Coach DeBoer Black Hoodies of Death," she says . all those stores do have plenty of something similar .

title: 2026 World Cup draw: How it works, what will be decided
content: the stage is almost set for the 2026 world cup, which begins June 11 and concludes with the final July 19 . the draw ceremony will be held at noon ET (5 p.m. GMT) at the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C., on Dec. 5 .

title: Who has the most work to do? Where all 30 teams stand ahead of winter meetings
content: the focus is shifting to every team's retooling effort for 2026 . it's going to have a tough act to follow . the heavy lifting of this hot stove season still lies ahead . for now, we'll check in with our first offseason stock watch .

title: 'Coastal Chaos' and 7-5 Duke:¬†Can the ACC's problems ever get resolved?
content: the ACC's system isn't much different than other conferences, coach says . it's a quirk of modern college football -- sprawling conferences with limited crossover between teams . if the stakes weren't so high, it might be a charming queirk of the conference .

title: Big day for Detroit offense powers Lions over Cowboys
content: quarterback Jahmyr Gibbs scores his third touchdown to widen the Lions' lead . he says the regular-season homestretch is a "must-win" game . it's the fifth time the team has scored at least 35 points this season .

title: Live updates: World Cup groups, matches, reaction
content: It's time! The eyes and fate of several nations will be focused on the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C., for the 2026  FIFA World Cup  group stage draw. Follow along for live updates, key statistics and instant reaction as we discover how the 48 teams will be placed across the United States, Mexico and Canada. Twelve groups of four will shape the road toward lifting soccer's biggest prize next summer in North America.

title: New NFL draft rankings: Miller stacks the top 50 prospects on his board
content: Dante Moore tops his list of 2026 NFL draft prospects . it's time to debut my rankings of the best prospects in the class . the list below is based on film study and conversations with scouts and evaluators .
